languages.text: "Что за вздор ты несешь, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}? Эрдриг погиб от рук ксеносов, атаковавших ночью наш лагерь!" {n}Каллигос или искусный лжец, или действительно не помнит произошедшего.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Что за вдор ты несешь, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}? Эрдриг погиб от рук ксеносов, атаковавших ночью наш лагерь!" {n}Каллигос или искусный лжец, или действительно не помнит произошедшего.{/n}

languages.text: "What nonsense are you spewing, new blood? Aerdrig died at the hands of the xenos who attacked our camp at night!" {n}Either Calligos is a skilful liar, or he truly cannot remember what actually happened.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Что за вздор ты несешь, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}? Эрдриг погиб от рук ксеносов, атаковавших ночью наш лагерь!" {n}Каллигос или искусный лжец, или действительно не помнит произошедшего.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What nonsense are you spewing, new blood? Aerdrig died at the hands of the xenos who had attacked our camp at night!" {n}Calligos is either a skilful liar or truly cannot remember anything that had happened.{/n}

"What nonsense are you spewing, new blood? Aerdrig died at the hands of the xenos who attacked our camp at night!" {n}Either Calligos is a skilful liar, or he truly cannot remember what actually happened.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Qué tonterías está diciendo, {mf|novato|novata}? ¡Aerdrig murió a manos de los xenos que atacaron nuestro campamento durante la noche!». {n}O Calligos es muy bueno mintiendo, o realmente no recuerda lo sucedido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What nonsense are you spewing, new blood? Aerdrig died at the hands of the xenos who attacked our camp at night!" {n}Either Calligos is a skilful liar, or he truly cannot remember what actually happened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué tonterías está diciendo, {mf|novato|novata}? ¡Aerdrig murió a manos de los xenos que atacaron nuestro campamento durante la noche!». {n}O Calligos es muy bueno mintiendo, o realmente no recuerda nada de lo sucedido.{/n}

languages.text: “你在胡说八道些什么呢，新来的？明明是一群异形在夜里袭击了我们的营地，杀害了艾德瑞格！”{n}卡里戈斯要么是个狡猾至极的骗子，要么他真的不记得事情的真相。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What nonsense are you spewing, new blood? Aerdrig died at the hands of the xenos who attacked our camp at night!" {n}Either Calligos is a skilful liar, or he truly cannot remember what actually happened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你在胡说八道些什么呢，新来的？明明是一群异形在夜里袭击了我们的营地，杀害了艾德瑞格！”{n}卡里戈斯要么是个狡猾至极的骗子，要么他真的不记得发生了什么事情。{/n}

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que vous racontez, novice ? Aerdrig s'est fait tuer par les xénos qui ont attaqué notre camp pendant la nuit ! » {n}Soit Calligos est un excellent menteur, soit il ne se souvient vraiment pas de ce qu'il s'est passé.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What nonsense are you spewing, new blood? Aerdrig died at the hands of the xenos who attacked our camp at night!" {n}Either Calligos is a skilful liar, or he truly cannot remember what actually happened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que vous racontez, novice ? Aerdrig s'est fait tuer par les xénos qui ont attaqué notre camp pendant la nuit ! » {n}Soit Calligos est un excellent menteur, soit il ne se souvient vraiment pas de ce qu'il s'est passé.{/n}

languages.text: 「何をバカなことを言っているんだ、新米よ。アエルダリは、夜間にキャンプを襲撃した異種族の手によって死んだんだ！」{n}カリゴスは嘘がうまいのか、それとも本当に何も覚えていないのかのどちらかだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What nonsense are you spewing, new blood? Aerdrig died at the hands of the xenos who attacked our camp at night!" {n}Either Calligos is a skilful liar, or he truly cannot remember what actually happened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「何をバカなことを言っているんだ、新米よ。アエルダリは、夜間にキャンプを襲撃した異種族の手によって死んだんだ！」{n}カリゴスは嘘がうまいのか、それとも本当に何も覚えていないのかのどちらかだった。{/n}

languages.text: "Was redet Ihr für einen Unsinn, neues Blut? Aerdrig ist durch die Hände der Xenos gestorben, die nachts unser Lager überfallen haben!" {n}Calligos ist entweder ein hervorragender Lügner oder kann sich wirklich an nichts erinnern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What nonsense are you spewing, new blood? Aerdrig died at the hands of the xenos who attacked our camp at night!" {n}Either Calligos is a skilful liar, or he truly cannot remember what actually happened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was redet Ihr für einen Unsinn, neues Blut? Aerdrig ist durch die Hände der Xenos gestorben, die nachts unser Lager überfallen haben!" {n}Calligos ist entweder ein hervorragender Lügner oder kann sich wirklich an nichts erinnern.{/n}

languages.text: "Ağzından çıkan bu saçmalıklar da ne böyle taze kan? Aerdrig, gece kampımıza saldıran zenoların elinde can verdi!" {n}Calligos, ya çok becerikli bir yalancı ya da gerçekte neler olup bittiğini hakikaten hatırlamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What nonsense are you spewing, new blood? Aerdrig died at the hands of the xenos who attacked our camp at night!" {n}Either Calligos is a skilful liar, or he truly cannot remember what actually happened.{/n}
